name: Aryan Island
description:
An android game where you breed your islanders in search for the best genetics; out of strength, looks and smarts.

 You can sell your slav- I mean islanders for cash, which you can use to.. buy more islanders. There are also quests you can complete to earn extra while in search for the ultimate 100, 100, 100 stats islander. (My best is 100, 100, 99, :P)
